300a5('bum): tu thob par byed do/ / de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge
300a6('bum): 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i
300a7('bum): skyon par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi
300b1('bum): 'khor lo skor ro/ / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
300b2('bum): sbyin pas mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
300b3('bum): bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do// gzhan
300b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing / mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de nor pa'i
300b5('bum): sems can rnams la nor byin zhing / tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu
300b6('bum): 'god do/ / de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
300b7('bum): las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems
301a1('bum): dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smyin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
301a2('bum): nyid thob par byed do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do//
301a3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor
301a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul lo// bzod pa'i
301a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa rjod do/ / gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing / mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas
301a6('bum): yongs su tshim par byed do/ / tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do/ shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de
301a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/
301b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go//
301b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
301b3('bum): pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
301b4('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
301b5('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo// gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul lo// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do// gzhan brtson 'grus rtsom
301b6('bum): pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing / mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin
301b7('bum): la rab tu 'god do/ / shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi
302a1('bum): phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
302a2('bum): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
302a3('bum): su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/
302a4('bum): sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/
302a5('bum): de thams cad kyang su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshad
302a6('bum): pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ gzhan yang tshad pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do// tshad pa
302a7('bum): dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa rjod do// gzhan tshad pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog pa de dag gi legs
302b1('bum): pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do/ / de tshad pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing / sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'god
302b2('bum): do/ / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
302b3('bum): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
302b4('bum): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
302b5('bum): su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems
302b6('bum): can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar kyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang
302b7('bum): su do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems
303a1('bum): can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do/ / tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do// rnam par grol ba'i
303a2('bum): ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgrub bo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go//
303a3('bum): shes rab sgom mo// gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go/ tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go/ bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go/ brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go/ ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go/ shes rab la rab tu gzhog go/ sbyin
303a4('bum): pa'i legs pa rjod do/ / tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do// bzod pa'i legs pa rjod do// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do// bsam gtan gyi legs pa rjod do/ shes rab kyi legs pa rjod do// gang gzhan sbyin pa yongs su
303a5('bum): gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de dag gi yang legs pa rjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha
303a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang thabs mkhas pas/
303a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su
303b1('bum): smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing
303b2('bum): 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do/ / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyis mthar kyis spyod pa rtsom ste/ de thams cad kyang su do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la
303b3('bum): ngo bo nyid do/ / // shes rab kyi pha tu pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mthar kyis spyad pa dang /
303b4('bum): mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa la slob ste/ de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed de/ de
303b5('bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo/ / chos rjes su dran pa sgom mo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom mo// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom mo// gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom mo// lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo// rab 'byor ji ltar
303b6('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
303b7('bum): rgyas gzugs su yid la byed/ tshor bar yid la byed/ 'du shes su yid la byed/ 'du byed du yid la byed/ rnam par shes par yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid de/
304a1('bum): gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'o// 'du shes la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni/ dngos po
304a2('bum): pa'o/ / 'du byed la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par
304a3('bum): nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
304a4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la byed/ sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la byed/ 'od 'dom gang bas yid la byed/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la
304a5('bum): byed do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni
304a6('bum): dngos po pa'o/ / 'od 'dam gang ba la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas
304a7('bum): ni dngos po pa dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom
304b1('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la byed/ ting nge 'dzin kyi phung por yid la byed/ shes rab kyi phung por yid la byed/ rnam par grol ba'i phung
304b2('bum): por yid la byed/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs par yid la byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid do/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po
304b3('bum): la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de
304b4('bum): ni dngos po pa'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa
304b5('bum): cing yid la bya ba pa ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
304b6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la byed/ 'jigs pa bzhis yid la byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la byed/ byams pa chen pos yid la byed/ snying rje chen pos yid la byed/
304b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad kyis yid la byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o// 'jigs pa bzhi
305a1('bum): la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o// byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid
305a2('bum): de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid
305a3('bum): pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
305a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rten cing
305a5('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni/ sangs rgyas
305a6('bum): rjes su dran pa'o/ / rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// de
305a7('bum): ltar na mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos
305b1('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
305b2('bum): tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam
305b3('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su
305b4('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
305b5('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
305b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
305b7('bum): do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
306a1('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
306a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
306a3('bum): tshul gyis/ pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong
306a4('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su
306a5('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
306a6('bum): do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
306a7('bum): gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
306b1('bum): gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams
306b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
306b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
306b4('bum): 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su
306b5('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
306b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
306b7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su
307a1('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su
307a2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
307a3('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ste/ de la dngos po yod par
307a4('bum): 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po par 'du shes pa yang na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa
307a5('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos
307a6('bum): thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ chos rjes su dran pa sgom na/ dge ba'i chos yid la byed/ dge ba'i chos yid la byed/ 'jig rten pa'i chos yid la byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
307a7('bum): yid la byed/ zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la byed/ zang zing pa'i chos yid la byed/ 'phags pa'i chos yid la byed/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la byed
307b1('bum): zag pa pa'i chos yid la byed/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la byed/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la byed/ gzugs pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'dus
307b2('bum): byas kyi chos yid la byed/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par
307b3('bum): nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni/ chos rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi
307b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/
307b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
307b6('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
307b7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
308a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
308a2('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
308a3('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
308a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
308a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong
308a6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
308a7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
308b1('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po
308b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba
308b3('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed
308b4('bum): do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo
308b5('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
308b6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i
308b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas
309a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
309a2('bum): mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa
309a3('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
309a4('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i
309a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying
309a6('bum): rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid
309a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
309b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po par 'du shes pa yang na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang
309b2('bum): yod pa'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309b3('bum): chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/
309b4('bum): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang /
309b5('bum): skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran
309b6('bum): par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la/
309b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar
310a1('bum): kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyod pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po
310a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
310a3('bum): tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
310a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid
310a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
310a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam
310a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
310b1('bum): byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
310b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos
310b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pa stong pa nyid yongs
310b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
310b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i
310b6('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
310b7('bum): gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs
311a1('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
311a2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
311a3('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
311a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
311a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
311a6('bum): gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
311a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
311b1('bum): par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo
311b2('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
311b3('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs
311b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am/ dngos po par 'du shes pa yang na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam
311b5('bum): yang yod pa'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
311b6('bum): dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/
311b7('bum): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / ma ral ba/ ma zhig pa/ ma 'dres pa/ skyon pa/ ma nyams pa/ mthu dang ldan pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa
312a1('bum): yin te/ de tshul khrims de dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po med
312a2('bum): pa/ dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa cing yid la bya ba pa ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
312a3('bum): la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod
312a4('bum): pa yin/ mthar kyis slob pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po pa'i
312a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
312a6('bum): tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
312a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa
312b1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
312b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don
312b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs
312b4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
312b5('bum): par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
312b6('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
312b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
313a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar
313a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs
313a3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
313a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i
313a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
313a6('bum): tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar
313a7('bum): pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid
313b1('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs
313b2('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
313b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
313b4('bum): tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen
313b5('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs
313b6('bum): par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
313b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes
314a1('bum): pa 'am/ dngos po par 'du shes pa yang na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong
314a2('bum): ba rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
314a3('bum): yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom zhing / gang zang zing gtong ba dang / chos gtong ba yid la byed de/ de yan lag dang / nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na/
314a4('bum): dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang / 'di ltar bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o// dngos po 'di gtang ba'o// 'di la gtang bar bya'o// snyam du mi sems so//
314a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa cing
314a6('bum): yid la bya ba pa ni/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa
314a7('bum): bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'
314b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
314b2('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
314b3('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
314b4('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs
314b5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
314b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus
314b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
315a1('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa
315a2('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
315a3('bum): byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
315a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
315a5('bum): gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
315a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs
315a7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
315b1('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
315b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs
315b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
315b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma pa'i ting nge
315b5('bum): 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su
315b6('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
315b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
316a1('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
316a2('bum): tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams
316a3('bum): cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
316a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po par 'du shes pa yang na/ dran
316a5('bum): pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
316a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du
316a7('bum): rtogs par byas nas/ lha rjes su dran pa sgom ste/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skyes pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pa dang / mtshe ma'i lhar skyes pa dang / dga' ldan gyi lhar skyes pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lhar skyes pa dang /
316b1('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skyes pa'i lha dag dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gzugs pa na spyod pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yid la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag la
316b2('bum): ngo bo nyid de/ gang la ngo bo nyid pa de dag ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pas ni dngos po pa dran par nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa cing / yid la bya ba pa ni/ lha rjes su dran pa'o//
316b3('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ lha rjes su dran pa sgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems
316b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar kyis spyad pa la slob cing /
316b5('bum): mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims
316b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha tu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
316b7('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
317a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
317a2('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
317a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs
317a4('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
317a5('bum): do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
317a6('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
317a7('bum): gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po
317b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
317b2('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su
317b3('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
317b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
317b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
317b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms
317b7('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
318a1('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan
318a2('bum): ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa
318a3('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par
318a4('bum): byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
318a5('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo
318a6('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
318a7('bum): tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
318b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po
318b2('bum): par 'du shes pa yang na/ dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
318b3('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / kyis 'jug pa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
318b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
318b5('bum): bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po
318b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
318b7('bum): gyis/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//
319a1('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
319a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la
319a3('bum): bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o//
319a4('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
319a5('bum): gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pa
319a6('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos
319a7('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo
319b1('bum): nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis// dbang
319b2('bum): po rnams la bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos
319b3('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam
319b4('bum): gtan rnams la bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
319b5('bum): bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
319b6('bum): bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o//
319b7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
320a1('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin
320a2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la
320a3('bum): bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
320a4('bum): gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi
320a5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
320a6('bum): chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la slob pa'i mthar kyis spyad pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis bslab pa yod pa yin/ mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
320a7('bum): chen po/ de mthar kyis spyad pa dang / mthar kyis bslab pa dang / mthar kyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
320b1('bum): do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
320b2('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
320b3('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
320b4('bum): gyis/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
320b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
320b6('bum): byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
320b7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
321a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
321a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
321a3('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i
321a4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
321a5('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
321a6('bum): gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
321a7('bum): stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i lam
321b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan
321b2('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par
321b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
321b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma pa'i
321b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams
321b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
321b7('bum): dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos
322a1('bum): po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
322a2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po
322a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i ngo
322a4('bum): bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de ni chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po pa yang
322a5('bum): na/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa 'am/ gam/ rna ba 'am/ sna 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ dri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg
322a6('bum): gam/ chos sam/ gi rnam par shes pa 'am/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'am/
322a7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
322b1('bum): tshor ba 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ yid
322b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'am/ sa'i khams sam/ chu'i khams sam/ khams sam/ rlung gi khams sam/ nam mkha'i khams sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams sam/ ma rig pa 'am/ 'du byed
322b3('bum): dam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ dang gzugs sam/ skye mched drug gam/ reg pa 'am/ tshor ba 'am/ sred pa 'am/ len pa 'am/ srid pa 'am/ skye ba 'am/ rga shi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa 'am/ tshul
322b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha tu phyin pa 'am/ nang stong pa nyid dam/ phyi stong pa
322b5('bum): nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma
322b6('bum): dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ pa stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa stong pa
322b7('bum): nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams
323a1('bum): sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad pa rnams sam/
323a2('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma pa 'am/ smon pa pa
323a3('bum): 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams
323a4('bum): pa chen po 'am/ snying rje chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'am/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad
323a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yod par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ de ni gnas do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te
323a6('bum): de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ 'o na ni gzugs kyang ma mchis/ tshor ba yang ma mchis/ 'du shes kyang ma mchis/ 'du byed kyang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa yang ma mchis/ khams
323a7('bum): rnams kyang ma mchis/ skye mched rnams kyang ma mchis/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang ma mchis/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ stong pa nyid
323b1('bum): thams cad kyang ma mchis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ dbang po rnams kyang ma mchis/ stobs rnams kyang ma mchis/
323b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang ma mchis/ lam yang ma mchis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ bsam gtan rnams kyang ma mchis/ tshad pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par
323b3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa
323b4('bum): yang ma mchis/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang ma mchis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang ma mchis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang ma mchis/ 'jigs pa rnams kyang ma
323b5('bum): mchis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ byams pa chen po yang ma mchis/ snying rje chen po yang ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang ma mchis/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ye shes
323b6('bum): kyang ma mchis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang ma mchis/ sangs rgyas kyang ma mchis/ chos kyang ma mchis/ dge 'dun yang ma mchis/ lam yang
323b7('bum): ma mchis/ 'bras bu yang ma mchis/ nyon mongs pa yang ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba yang ma mchis/ 'thob pa yang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa yang ma mchis/ chos thams cad kyang ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom
324a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid la yod pa 'am/ pa zhig su yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/
324a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la mchis pa 'am/ ma mchis pa so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na ci'i phyir/ khyod de
324a3('bum): ltar gal te chos thams cad dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/ gzugs kyang / tshor ba yang / 'du shes kyang / 'du byed kyang / rnam par shes pa yang / kyang / rna ba yang / sna yang
324a4('bum): / lce yang / lus kyang / yid kyang / gzugs kyang / sgra yang med/ dri yang / ro yang / reg kyang / chos kyang / gi rnam par shes pa yang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang
324a5('bum): / sna'i rnam par shes pa yang / lce'i rnam par shes pa yang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang / gi 'dus te reg pa yang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang
324a6('bum): / sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang / rna ba'i 'dus te
324a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
324b1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba yang / sa'i khams kyang / chu'i khams kyang / khams kyang / rlung gi khams kyang / nam mkha'i khams kyang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang / ma rig pa yang / 'du byed kyang
324b2('bum): / rnam par shes pa yang / dang gzugs kyang / skye mched drug kyang / reg pa yang / tshor ba yang / sred pa yang / len pa yang / srid pa yang / skye ba yang / rga shi yang / sbyin pa'i pha
324b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa yang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
324b4('bum): pa yang / nang stong pa nyid kyang / phyi stong pa nyid kyang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang / chen po stong pa nyid kyang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang / 'dus ma
324b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang / rang gi mtshan nyid
324b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang / pa stong pa nyid kyang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang / yang dag par spong ba
324b7('bum): rnams kyang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang / dbang po rnams kyang / stobs rnams kyang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang /
325a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyang / tshad pa rnams kyang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang / rnam par thar pa rnams kyang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
325a2('bum): kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
325a3('bum): stobs rnams kyang / 'jigs pa rnams kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang / byams pa chen po yang / snying rje chen po yang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang / thams cad shes pa nyid
