397a5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mngon
397a6('bum): par shes pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
397a7('bum): par de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'jigs pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'dus pa
397b1('bum): lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par byams pa chen po 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par snying rje chen po 'dus pa lags/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
397b2('bum): 'dres pa rnams 'dus pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar mtshan nyid kyang tha dad la 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig par gyur pa de dag rnam pa ji lta bur gdags par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol
397b3('bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam lta
397b4('bum): bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar
397b5('bum): len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// smyig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len
397b6('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po
397b7('bum): lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la
398a1('bum): gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// sgra brnyan lta bu'i nye bar
398a2('bum): len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len
398a3('bum): pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye
398a4('bum): bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// sprul pa lta bu'i nye
398a5('bum): bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// shes rab sgom mo// de 'di ltar rtog ste/ nye bar len
398a6('bum): pa'i phung po lnga ni lam lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni smyig rgyu lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po
398a7('bum): lnga ni chu zla lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni yor lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni gzugs
398b1('bum): brnyan lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ mtshan nyid pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
398b2('bum): lam la rang bzhin gang yang do// sgyu ma la rang bzhin gang yang do// smig rgyu la rang bzhin gang yang do// chu zla la rang bzhin gang yang do// yor la rang bzhin gang yang do// sgra brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang
398b3('bum): do/ / gzugs brnyan la rang bzhin gang yang do// dri za'i grong khyer la rang bzhin gang yang do// sprul pa la rang bzhin gang yang do// gang la rang bzhin pa de la mtshan nyid do// gang la mtshan nyid pa
398b4('bum): de ni/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par byed de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ sbyin pa ni mtshan nyid pa'o// gtong ba ni mtshan nyid pa'o//
398b5('bum): len pa ni mtshan nyid pa'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ste/ gang de ltar shes nas sbyin pa gtong ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ tshul
398b6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog go/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog go/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog go/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog go/ shes rab kyi pha
398b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa las phyir ldog go/ de pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la gnas shing / bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshad pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par
399a1('bum): 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
399a2('bum): byed do/ / dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// nang stong
399a3('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed
399a4('bum): do/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
399a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rang
399a6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po pa'i
399a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
399b1('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su
399b2('bum): rdzogs par byed do/ / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya yongs su rdzogs par byed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'jigs
399b3('bum): pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de 'phags
399b4('bum): pa'i chos byang ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba rnams la gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad grangs dpag tu pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
399b5('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi drung du/ rdzu 'phrul gyis song zhing na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bsnyen bkur byed de/
399b6('bum): longs spyod dang / skyid pa thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// de na sems can gang sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sbyin pas yongs su sdud do// gang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshul
399b7('bum): khrims kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang bzod pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang bzod pas yongs su sdud do// gang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang brtson 'grus kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ting nge 'dzin gyis
400a1('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang shes rab kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do// gang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
400a2('bum): kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
400a3('bum): yongs su sdud do/ / gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
400a4('bum): sdud do/ / gang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
400a5('bum): sdud do/ / gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / mtha' las 'dus pa stong
400a6('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
400a7('bum): kyang dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag
400b1('bum): kyang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
400b2('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
400b3('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang dran pa nye
400b4('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang
400b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang stobs rnams
400b6('bum): kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang lam gyis yongs su
400b7('bum): bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang
401a1('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang tshad pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang tshad pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis
401a2('bum): yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam par thar pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang mthar kyis
401a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
401a4('bum): pas yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pas yongs su sdud do// gang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / mngon par shes
401a5('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis
401a6('bum): yongs su sdud do/ / gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang /
401a7('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su sdud do// gang byams pa chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang
401b1('bum): byams pa chen pos yongs su sdud do/ / gang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su sdud do// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
401b2('bum): kyis yongs su sdud do/ / gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do// gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
401b3('bum): bus yongs su sdud do/ / gang phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus yongs su sdud do// gang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang dgra bcom pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rang byang chub kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rang byang chub kyis
401b4('bum): yongs su sdud do/ / gang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su sdud do// gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
401b5('bum): kyis yongs su sdud do/ / de ltar gang dang gang dge ba'i chos gang dang gang gis yongs su bsdu ba de dag kyang / dge ba'i chos de dang de dag gis yongs su sdud do// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang ldan zhing chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bas/
401b6('bum): 'khor ba nye bar len kyang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gos te/ de sems can rnams kyi don du dang lha'i phun sum tshogs pa nye bar len te/ phun sum tshogs pa de dag gis sems can rnams yongs su sdud do// de chos thams cad
401b7('bum): mtshan nyid par shes pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la gnas so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la gnas so// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes kyang de la gnas so// dgra bcom pa nyid shes kyang de la gnas so//
402a1('bum): rang byang chub shes kyang de la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos thams cad shes par bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
402a2('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mtshan nyid par shes pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid par shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// bzod pa'i
402a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid par shes so/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid par shes so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid med par shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid par
402a4('bum): shes so/ / nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// phyi stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// chen po stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par
402a5('bum): shes so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid
402a6('bum): par shes so/ / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// dor ba pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
402a7('bum): mtshan nyid par shes so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// dngos po pa stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// ngo bo nyid stong pa
402b1('bum): nyid mtshan nyid par shes so/ / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan nyid par shes so//
402b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// dbang po rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// stobs rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// 'phags pa'i
402b3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan nyid par shes so/ / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// bsam gtan rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// tshad pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// gzugs
402b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so/ / rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// rnam par thar pa'i
402b5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa mtshan nyid par shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan nyid
402b6('bum): par shes so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// 'jigs pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// byams pa chen po mtshan nyid
402b7('bum): par shes so/ / snying rje chen po mtshan nyid par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan nyid par shes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid par shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan
403a1('bum): nyid par shes so/ / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mtshan nyid par shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// rang byang chub mtshan nyid par shes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan nyid
403a2('bum): par shes so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan nyid par shes so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung
403a3('bum): po lnga la gnas/ sgyu ma lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ smig rgyu lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ chu zla lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ yor lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta
403a4('bum): bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / tshul
403a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rmi lam lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgyu ma lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i
403a6('bum): phung po lnga smig rgyu lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga chu zla lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga yor lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sgra brnyan lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga gzugs brnyan lta bur shes/
403a7('bum): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dri za'i grong khyer lta bur shes/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sprul pa lta bur shes nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid pa/ ma zhig pa/ ma ral ba/ skyon pa/ rnyog pa pa/ nyams pa
403b1('bum): pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ mkhas pas bsngags pa/ shin tu rdzogs pa/ 'phags par gyur pa/ zag pa pa/ lam gyi khongs su chud pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la gnas shing yang dag par blang ba'i
403b2('bum): brda dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims dang / chos nyid kyis thob pa'i tshul khrims dang / sdom pa'i tshul khrims dang / pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khrims dang / spyad pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // de tshul khrims de lta bu dang
403b3('bum): ldan yang 'dis bdag rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/ bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam pa 'am/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyal phran
403b4('bum): nam/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar bya'o zhe'am/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe ba'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum mam/ mtshe ma 'am/ dga' ldan nam/ 'phrul dga' 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang
403b5('bum): byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar bya'o zhe 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o zhe 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ byang
403b6('bum): chub thob par bya'o zhes tshul khrims des snyems pa do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid pa ste/ 'di ltar dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mtshan nyid gcig pas na mtshan nyid pa'i chos kyis
403b7('bum): mtshan nyid pa'i chos thob par rung ngo / / mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos kyis kyang mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thob par rung ngo // mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid pa'i chos kyis kyang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa 'am/ mtshan nyid
404a1('bum): pa'i chos thob par rung ngo / / rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid pa yongs su rdzogs par byas
404a2('bum): nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug pa'i tshe/ skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par
404a3('bum): shes pa lnga rab tu thob nas/ gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
404a4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor yang / 'khor ba'i las rnam par smin pas gos par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dper na/
404a5('bum): sprul pa ni 'gro ba 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba byed kyang de la 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba 'am/ sdod pa 'am/ 'dug pa 'am/ nyal ba yang te/ de sems can rnams kyi don kyang byed do// sems can dang sems can
404a6('bum): du btags pa yang so/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu zhi ba zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
404a7('bum): par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad pa theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang gang bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu gang
404b1('bum): yang ma gzigs nas/ des tshe'i 'du byed spangs nas sprul pa sprul pa mdzad de/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// rab 'byor de ltar sprul pa des bskal ba gcig lon nas byang chub
404b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed dam/
404b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'am/ dngos po gang yang su do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang sems can nam sems can du gdags pa yang la/ sems can rnams kyi don yang byed do/ rab
404b4('bum): 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs pas mtshan nyid pa'i chos thams
404b5('bum): cad khong du chud par shes so/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / yor
404b6('bum): lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas te/ mtshan nyid pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
404b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid pa'i chos rnams la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa gnyis kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
405a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nyams su len pa'i bzod pa dang / chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa'o// de la nyams su len pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas
405a2('bum): nye bar bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du gal te sems can thams cad yang dang yang 'ongs shing gshe ba 'am/ snyan par brjod cing ma klas pa'i tshig brlang
405a3('bum): ba zer bar gyur tam/ rdo dbyug dang / mtshon chas brdegs sam/ btab kyang de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ sems bskyed pa 'ga'
405a4('bum): tsam yang 'khrug pa dang ldan pa 'am/ gnod sems dang ldan pa bskyed par bya ste/ phyir sems can de dag la kye ma/ sems can 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis mnar ba ste/ 'di dag la bdag gis
405a5('bum): sdig to'i sems skyed kyi/ 'di ni bdag nyid kyis phung po dgrar gyur pa 'di rnams blangs pa'i lan to zhes de dag la lhag par snying rje bskyed par bya'o// byams pa dang ldan te/ snying rje bar gyur nas/ rnam pa de ltar
405a6('bum): rtog pa 'di ni nyams su len pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o/ / de la chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa gang zhe na/ sems can de dag kyang don dam par su na/ bdag la gshe ba 'am/ snyan par brjod pa 'am/
405a7('bum): ma klas pa'i tshig brlang po zer ba 'am/ rdo dbyug gis brdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod de/ 'du byed thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu gsob gsog rag lus pa/ nam mkha' lta bu bdag dang sems can dang /
405b1('bum): srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / bral ba ste/ rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin na/ bdag la
405b2('bum): gshe ba dang / snyan par brjod pa dang / ma klas pa'i tshig brlang par zer pa dang / rdo dbyug gis rdeg cing mtshon 'debs pa lta su zhig yod do/ bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid nye bar
405b3('bum): bzung ste/ de ltar rnam par brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos khong du chud pa'i bzod pa zhes bya ste/ de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
405b4('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs pa des skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo/ / rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skye ba'i chos la bzod pa zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de la spangs pa ni ci mchis/ ye shes ni ci mchis/
405b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos gang la rdul tsam yang skye ba pa de ni skye ba'o// de gang gis shes pa de ni bzod pa zhes bya ste/ shes pa des skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 'thob bo// gsol
405b6('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa'i
405b7('bum): bzod pa de dag la bye brag tu bgyi ba ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
406a1('bum): bzod pa'o/ / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// phyir 'ong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba
406a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// dgra bcom pa'i shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'o// rang sangs rgyas
406a3('bum): kyi shes pa gang yin pa dang / spang ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i
406a4('bum): bye brag yin no/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bzod pa de lta bu dang ldan pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil kyis gnon te/ de rnam par smin pa las byung pa'i skye ba'i
406a5('bum): chos kyi bzod pa la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam la spyod cing / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de yongs su rdzogs pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
406a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa lnga dang 'bral ba yin/ de mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'bral bas/ sems can rnams
406a7('bum): yongs su smin par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa yin/ de sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/ skad cig gcig dang ldan
406b1('bum): pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid pa'i bzod
406b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung
406b3('bum): po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / lus
406b4('bum): dang sems kyi brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / de lus kyi brtson 'grus kyis rdzu 'phrul/ mngon par sgrub ste/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
406b5('bum): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing / sems can rnams kyi don byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// de lus kyi brtson 'grus des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ theg
406b6('bum): pa gsum la 'dzud cing rab tu 'god do/ / rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan nyid pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
406b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ / de sems kyi brtson 'grus zag pa pa/ lam gyi yan lag tu gyur pa/ lam gyi khongs su chud pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang du dge ba'i chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye
407a1('bum): bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
407a2('bum): brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
407a3('bum): pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad yongs su
407a4('bum): 'dus pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ de la spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ de yongs su rdzogs pas/ bag chags kyi
407a5('bum): mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/ / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spangs nas/ mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// kun tu snang ba thob par byas nas/ chos kyi
407a6('bum): 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du bskor ba skor bar 'gyur ro/ de bskor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yo ba dang / rab tu g.yo ba dang / kun nas g.yo pa dang / 'gul ba
407a7('bum): dang / rab tu 'gul ba dang / kun nas 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa dang / rab tu ldeg pa dang / kun nas ldeg par 'gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas par
407b1('bum): gang bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i sgra gang du byung zhing dbyangs grag par gyur pa'i sgra de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed kyis thos pa de/
407b2('bum): thams cad theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar phan pa chen po dang ldan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub
407b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
407b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang / yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge
407b5('bum): 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang /
407b6('bum): yor lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
407b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs
408a1('bum): te gnas so/ / byams pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// snying rje chen po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// dga' ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// btang snyoms la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
408a2('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// stong pa nyid
408a3('bum): dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// glog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ma gtogs par nyan thos dang thun mong
408a4('bum): ba'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang thun mong pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang ji snyed pa dang / gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus kyis khyab par byas shing / nye bar bsgrubs te gnas kyang / ting nge 'dzin de dag dang /
408a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'bras bu'i ro myong bar byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gi mtshan nyid pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pas na/ mtshan nyid pa'i chos
408a6('bum): mtshan nyid pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed par yang ga la 'gyur/ dngos po pa'i chos kyang dngos po pa'i chos kyi ro myong bar byed pa ga la 'gyur te/ de ro myong bar byed pa pas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis dbang gis kyang gzugs kyi khams sam/
408a7('bum): gzugs pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des khams de gnyis kyang / gang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / gang gis snyoms par 'jug pa de yang so// de pas mtshan nyid pa'i ting nge 'dzin
408b1('bum): gyi pha tu pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las yongs su 'da'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
408b2('bum): po ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yongs su 'da' ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nang stong
408b3('bum): pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la shin tu
408b4('bum): bslabs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dor ba pa
408b5('bum): stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang /
408b6('bum): dngos po pa stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la shin tu bslabs pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid 'di dag la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
408b7('bum): bu 'am/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de yang stong pa nyid rnams kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid de dag gis byang chub
409a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las shin tu 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon ni gang lags/
409a2('bum): skyon ma mchis pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor pa thams cad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon no// pa thams cad ni skyon pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
409a3('bum): pa ni gang lags/ pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// rab 'byor tshor ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
409a4('bum): po'i pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'du shes ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// rab 'byor 'du byed ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
409a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o/ / dang gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// rna ba dang sgra ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// sna dang dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
409a6('bum): chen po'i pa'o/ / lce dang ro ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// lus dang reg bya ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pa'o// yid dang chos ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
409a7('bum): pa'o/ / gi rnam par shes pa ni pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa ni pa'o// gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te
409b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni pa'o/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni pa'o//
409b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
409b3('bum): tshor ba ni pa'o/ / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni pa'o// sa'i khams ni pa'o// chu'i khams ni
409b4('bum): pa'o/ / khams ni pa'o// rlung gi khams ni pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni pa'o// ma rig pa ni pa'o// 'du byed ni
409b5('bum): pa'o/ / rnam par shes pa ni pa'o// dang gzugs ni pa'o// skye mched drug ni pa'o// reg pa ni pa'o// tshor ba ni pa'o// sred pa ni pa'o// len pa ni pa'o//
409b6('bum): srid pa ni pa'o// skye ba ni pa'o// rga shi ni pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pa'o// brtson
409b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni pa'o// phyi nang stong pa
410a1('bum): nyid ni pa'o/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni
410a2('bum): pa'o/ / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni pa'o// dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
410a3('bum): ni pa'o/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni pa'o// pa stong pa nyid ni pa'o// dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni pa'o// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid
410a4('bum): stong pa nyid ni pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni pa'o// dbang po rnams ni pa'o// stobs rnams ni pa'o// byang
410a5('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams ni pa'o/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni pa'o// tshad pa rnams ni pa'o//
410a6('bum): gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad ni pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
410a7('bum): pa ni pa'o/ / mngon par shes pa rnams ni pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni pa'o// 'jigs pa bzhi ni pa'o// so so yang dag par
410b1('bum): rig pa bzhi ni pa'o/ / byams pa chen po ni pa'o// snying rje chen po ni pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad ni pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni pa'o//
410b2('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni pa'o// rang byang chub ni pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni pa ste skyon no// rab 'byor skyon pa ni gang la gzugs
410b3('bum): dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
410b4('bum): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
410b5('bum): te reg pa dang / gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi
410b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang / sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / dang gzugs dang /
410b7('bum): skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
411a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
411a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa
411a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
411a4('bum): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad pa rnams dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par
411a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
411a6('bum): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig
411a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / chos de dag gi brjod pa yang su pa'o// //
